name: Get me out of drug rehab!!!
description: Guys I am currently in a drug rehab clinic.I love to consume alcohol and cocaine. My wife gave me a choice: either I go to a clinic or she leaves me. I decided to go to rehab against my will. But when I still had money, everything would be ok and I could do whatever I want. Unfortunately I lost a lot of money due to greedy business partners(assholes). Now it occurred to me to ask her an immoral question: „What if I could bring home $100k right now? Can I come back and get back my life/lifestyle?“ She answered: „Yes!“ Guys I want to go out of this rehab hell and want go back to drink my scotch and snorting my lines. Help me guys! Support me in the name of the coca god! I invite the person to Switzerland who donates the highest amount through this funding. We will celebrate a legendary party together! The flight, accommodation, drinks, best coca, best girls, best restaurant inclusive! I pick you up personally at Zurich airport! I know it sounds crazy but I'm fucking serious! Take me out anon!!
